faqs.question: How to apply for a loan using online portal?
faqs.answer: Please navigate to Loans secion and click on desired loan type from the list shown

faqs.question: How to download loan documents using online portal?
faqs.answer: Please navigate to loans section and in the left navigation panel click on the downloads, from there choose desired loan type from the list and download relaven loan application

faqs.question: What types of loans are available?
faqs.answer: We currently offer Personal Loans, Housing Loans, Small Business Loans and Student Loans

faqs.question: What is the early settlement fee for the loan i acquired?
faqs.answer: Please reach one of our customer care reperesentative to get the relavent settlement fee details

faqs.question: How to apply for a Credit Card?
faqs.answer: Please navigate to Cards secion from left navigation bar and click on desired card type from the list shown

faqs.question: What are the interest rates applicable to a Credit Card?
faqs.answer: Please refer the following docuemnt for interest rates
